steps: Replace the current steps 1-5 with the specified 8-step sequence: (1) Study specs and IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.json, (2) Pick highest-priority incomplete task, (3) Search codebase before implementing, (4) Implement the change, (5) Run tests for changed code, (6) Update IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.json, (7) Stage changed files and commit, (8) Check if all tasks complete — signal <promise>COMPLETE</promise> if yes

description: Reorganize ralph-build ## Rules into 4 named groups from the spec
steps: Create 'Quality' group with: no placeholders/stubs (item 99999999999), implement completely, resolve failing tests even if unrelated (item 999999), extra logging for debugging (item 9999999), documentation capturing the why (item 99999)

Create 'Knowledge' group with: keep IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.json current with learnings (item 99999999), update AGENTS.md with operational commands only (item 999999999), keep AGENTS.md operational only — no status/progress (item 99999999999999), clean completed items periodically (item 999999999999)
Create 'Consistency' group with: if spec inconsistencies found use Opus subagent to update specs (item 9999999999999), document discovered bugs in plan even if unrelated (item 9999999999)

Create 'Subagents' group with: parallelize reads/searches aggressively with Sonnet subagents, use single subagent for build/test, use Opus subagents for complex reasoning (debugging, architectural decisions)
